f:I[63327,["/_next/static/chunks/2fd32df42ef26f8b.js","/_next/static/chunks/f501513783488158.js"],"default"]
10:T1507,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Bulk Operations</h1>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Overview</h2>
Bulk operations allow you to delete multiple image tags efficiently based on patterns, age, or retention policies.

<img src="/img/docker-registry-ui/bulk-operations.png" alt="Bulk Operations Interface" class="rounded-lg border border-gray-200 my-6" />

<strong class="text-gray-900">⚠️ WARNING: Expert-Only Activity</strong>
This is a dangerous operation that <strong class="text-gray-900">cannot be undone</strong>. Deleted tags cannot be recovered. The system has no knowledge of which images are in use or deployed.
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Pattern-Based Deletion</h2>
Delete tags matching wildcard patterns:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Delete all dev tags
Pattern: dev-<em>
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Delete all feature branch tags</h1>
Pattern: feature-</em>
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Delete all tags with specific suffix</h1>
Pattern: <em>-snapshot
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Age-Based Cleanup</h2>
Remove tags older than specified days:


Delete tags older than 30 days
Delete tags older than 90 days
Custom age threshold
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Retention Policies</h2>
Keep minimum number of recent tags:


Keep last 5 tags, delete older ones
Keep last 10 tags, delete older ones
Custom retention count
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Dry Run Mode</h2>
Preview deletions before executing:


Enable dry run mode
Configure deletion criteria
Review list of tags to be deleted
Execute if satisfied
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Safety Features</h2>

<strong class="text-gray-900">Mandatory Keep Minimum</strong>: Required field when using age-based deletion
<strong class="text-gray-900">Dry Run by Default</strong>: Preview results before actual deletion
<strong class="text-gray-900">Confirmation Checkbox</strong>: Must acknowledge danger before running
<strong class="text-gray-900">Operation Summary</strong>: AWS-style summary showing exactly what will happen
<strong class="text-gray-900">Visual Warnings</strong>: Red danger buttons and prominent alerts
<strong class="text-gray-900">Input Validation</strong>: Frontend and backend validation of parameters
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Recommended Keep Minimum Values</h2>



Repository Type
Keep Minimum
Reason

<p class="text-gray-700 mb-4 leading-relaxed">
</p>

Development
5-10 tags
Recent builds for debugging


Staging
10-20 tags
Testing and rollback capability


Production
20-50 tags
Multiple rollback options


Base Images
50+ or avoid
May be used by many other images
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">When NOT to Use Bulk Operations</h2>

Production base images (company-wide base images)
Images with unknown usage
Repositories you don't fully understand
When unsure about deployment dependencies
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Limitations (By Design)</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">No Usage History</h3>

System does <strong class="text-gray-900">NOT track</strong> which images are in use
Cannot detect if image is deployed in production
Cannot identify base images used by other images
User must know their deployment architecture
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Manual Garbage Collection Required</h3>

Deleting tags only removes manifest references
Actual image layers remain on disk
Must run garbage collection manually to free space
See "Cleanup Instructions" menu for commands
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Example Workflows</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Clean Up Development Tags</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">1. Navigate to repository
2. Click "Bulk Delete"
3. Pattern: dev-</em>
4. Enable dry run
5. Review tags to delete
6. Execute deletion
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Implement Retention Policy</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">1. Navigate to repository
2. Click "Bulk Delete"
3. Select "Keep last N tags"
4. Set retention count: 10
5. Enable dry run
6. Review tags to delete
7. Execute deletion
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Recovery Options</h2>
If you accidentally delete important tags:


<strong class="text-gray-900">Check CI/CD pipeline</strong>: May have build artifacts
<strong class="text-gray-900">Rebuild from source</strong>: If you have Dockerfile and code
<strong class="text-gray-900">Restore from backup</strong>: If you backup your registry
<strong class="text-gray-900">Pull from other environments</strong>: Dev/staging may have copies

<strong class="text-gray-900">Prevention is key</strong>: Always use dry run, keep higher minimum than needed, and document critical images before cleanup.6:["$","div",null,{"className":"flex min-h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]","children":[["$","$Lf",null,{"groups":[{"title":"Getting Started","items":[{"id":"getting-started","title":"Installation","slug":"getting-started"},{"id":"configuration","title":"Configuration","slug":"configuration"}]},{"title":"Features","items":[{"id":"features","title":"Overview","slug":"features"},{"id":"security","title":"Security Scanning","slug":"security"},{"id":"bulk-operations","title":"Bulk Operations","slug":"bulk-operations"}]},{"title":"Examples","items":[{"id":"multi-registry","title":"Multi-Registry Setup","slug":"examples/multi-registry"},{"id":"basic-auth","title":"Basic Auth Registry","slug":"examples/basic-auth"}]},{"title":"Reference","items":[{"id":"api","title":"API Integration","slug":"api"},{"id":"development","title":"Development","slug":"development"},{"id":"testing","title":"Testing Guide","slug":"testing"}]}],"basePath":"/docker-registry-ui","title":"$undefined"}],["$","main",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 py-8","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-8","children":["$","$L5",null,{"href":"/docker-registry-ui","className":"text-sm text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 flex items-center gap-1","children":"← Back to Docker Registry UI"}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2","children":"Bulk Delete Operations"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-600 text-lg mb-8","children":"Bulk Delete Operations for Docker Registry UI"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$10"}}]]}]]}]}]]}]
b:[["$","meta","0",{"charSet":"utf-8"}],["$","meta","1",{"name":"viewport","content":"width=device-width, initial-scale=1"}]]
